form.official-title: To amend title 36, United States Code, to require that the POW/MIA flag be displayed on all days that the flag of the United States is displayed on certain Federal property.

section.header: Days on which the POW/MIA flag is displayed on certain Federal property
section.text: Section 902 of title 36, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking subsection (c) and inserting the following new subsection:

subsection.text: For the purposes of this section, POW/MIA flag display days are all days on which the flag of the United States is displayed.

paragraph.text: in subsection (d)(1) by striking Capitol and inserting U.S. Capitol;
in subsection (d)(2) by striking White House and inserting U.S. White House; and
in subsection (e) by striking Capitol each place it appears and inserting U.S. Capitol.
